title: Sparkling Diamond Vanki Bangles - Wavy Lines of Brilliance
materials: G Color). Crafted with a smooth Hyderabadi polish for a lasting shine. Guaranteed gold purity with hallmark certification.
features: Featuring a unique wavy design, these bangles are set with meticulously placed round-cut diamonds along the undulating gold lines. The design offers a modern twist to traditional bangle styles, providing a comfortable and elegant fit. The setting is a secure prong setting, ensuring the diamonds remain safe and sparkle brilliantly.
colors: Yellow Gold and White Diamonds. This classic combination offers a timeless and versatile appeal
occasions: festive celebrations like Diwali and Sankranti
and weddings. A sophisticated addition to both traditional attire like sarees and lehengas
description: These diamond vanki bangles combine modern design with exceptional craftsmanship. The wavy diamond setting creates a unique visual appeal, making them a statement piece. High-quality materials ensure lasting beauty and durability. The secure setting and comfortable fit make these bangles a practical and beautiful investment.
